brainly_data.question: Ismene, dear sister, you would think that we had already suffered enough for the curse on oedipus cannot imagine any grief that you and i have not gone through. what helps antigone make the dangerous decision to bury her brother, despite known the consequences ?
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question: Ismene, dear sister, you would think that we had already suffered enough for the curse on oedipus cannot imagine any grief that you and i have not gone through. what helps antigone make the dangerous decision to bury her brother, despite known the consequences ?
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: I believe the answer is choice B. Antigone believes she’s doomed because of her father
